EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email - !@ILTA Webinar4
EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder: IntApp Webinar Login Information...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IntApp- Webinar Confirmation
Hi, Thanks for registering for the "Not @ILTA" Webinar Series. Today's topic is Getting the Most from Microsoft SharePoint. It will start in half an hour, at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern (5pm BST) today. Video and audio access instructions are below:
Webinar Title: Getting the Most from Microsoft SharePoint
Video:
Conference URL: https://www.livemeeting.com/cc/vcc/join?id=w7654115&role=attend&pw=A7654115
Meeting ID: w7654115 Entry Code: A7654115
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In
US/Canada: 888-500-6975 UK: 0-800-404-7656 Passcode: 7654115
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
